name: SO301 – Kairei Vent Field
description: Sampling hydrothermal plumes along the Central Indian Ridge near the Kairei Vent Field, integrating multidisciplinary approaches to study biogeochemical cycles.

name: M210 – Mid-Atlantic Ridge Expedition
description: Study of microbial and chemical gradients across Mid-Atlantic hydrothermal plumes.

name: Greenland Spreading Zone: Exploring Extreme Habitats in Arctic seamounts and hydrothermal vents (GREAT)
